sentence.Network_en: This is clearly designed to befuddle the public.
sentence.Network_cn: 这显然是为了蒙蔽舆论.

sentence.Network_en: Don't befuddle me with all those masses of detail.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要拿一大堆琐事把我搞迷糊.

sentence.Network_en: He also fabricates sensational lies to befuddle world opinion.
sentence.Network_cn: 他也编造耸人听闻的谎言欺骗世界舆论.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...胡敏读故事记单词托福词汇022-英语听力-view... ...befuddle vt. 使酒醉昏迷；使迷惑，使迷糊befuddled adj. 酒醉的，迷路的，困惑的
2008考研英语全题型高分强化教程五(2) ... admonition 警告 befuddle 使迷惑，使迷糊 anomalous 不规则的，反常的.
答案与题解 ...befuddle 使迷惑，使迷糊anomalous 不规则的，反常的
beforehand adv. 事先地befuddle v. 使昏乱beget v. 引起；产生

list.abs: The long discussion befuddled them ., 长时间的讨论使得他们头昏脑胀.
醉英文表达_百度知道 ... 喝醉了的 canned 醉生梦死 lead a befuddled life 醉心于 idolize.
He also fabricates sensational lies to befuddle world opinion ., 他也编造耸人听闻的谎言欺骗世界舆论.
a question that befuddled even the professor ;, 这个问题甚至难住了教授;

entry.def: If something befuddles you, it confuses your mind or thoughts.

example.tran: 搞得他们晕头转向的问题

means.word_mean: 1. be confusing or perplexing to; cause to be unable to think clearly;

auth_sentence.content: I suppose a complex pheromone based language would befuddle us.
auth_sentence.res_content: I suppose a complex pheromone based language would befuddle us.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I suppose a complex pheromone based language would befuddle us.

auth_sentence.content: Certainty came in a guise of inscrutability; the products designed to reassure also happened to befuddle.
auth_sentence.res_content: Certainty came in a guise of inscrutability; the products designed to reassure also happened to befuddle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Certainty came in a guise of inscrutability; the products designed to reassure also happened to befuddle.
